entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
